page.title: 15Transport
page.content: There are many different means of travel in our area.The main transport we use are cars.We see lorries, vans and motor bikes in this neighbourhood. City Transport buses travel to and from Southampton and around the outskirts of the city.In Woolston there is a small train station at which some trains travelling between Portsmouth and Southampton. Outside our area is Southampton (Eastleigh) airport.We sometimes see planes flying overhead between the city airport and the Channel Islands or the continent. We did a survey to discover how people in our class travel to school-: Walking-----11 By bicycle---5 By car-------5 By bus-------5 By train-----2
